<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101505</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Studying the Sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudier le soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudando o sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studiare il sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiar el sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Getting a good look at the Sun - from Galileo's time to today.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einen guten Blick an der Sonne - von der Zeit 
Galileos nach heute erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atteignant un bon regard le soleil - du temps de 
Galilée à aujourd'hui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Começando um olhar bom no sol - do tempo de 
Galileo a hoje.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenendo un buon sguardo al sole - da tempo del 
Galileo ad oggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παίρνοντας ένα καλό βλέμμα στον ήλιο - από το χρόνο
Γαλιλαίου σε σήμερα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Consiguiendo una buena mirada en el sol - a partir
del tiempo de Galileo a hoy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

          <contribute>
